CustomField.description: Total of payment fees, platform fees & tips
CustomField.formula: Auction_payment_fee__c + Buy_now_payment_fee__c + Pledge_payment_fee__c + Ticketing_payment_fee__c + Total_Raffle_Payment_Platform_Fee__c + Total_Value_of_Tips__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total of payment fees, platform fees & tips
CustomField.label: Total Fees (Formula)
